title: PRICING | Naturopathic Holistic Medicine |Atlas Naturopathic
description: We are a family health center that utilizes modern and traditional therapies. We address the root cause of your concerns, not simply treating the symptoms but by treating you as a whole.
cleaned_text: top of page Our Pricing We are a self-pay clinic and are as transparent as possible with our pricing. Aromatherapy We offer dTERRA essential oils and relaxing music as included options for any of our bodywork or healing arts treatments. Complimentary Types of Payment Accepted We accept the following payment methods: cash, check, HSA/FSA* cards, and all credit/debit cards. *Please note that insurance coverage varies for Health Savings and Flex Spending accounts, to confirm if Naturopathic Care is covered please contact your insurance provider to determine individual coverage. bottom of page
